content:
I wanted to translate the below JSON payload into FHIR format. So I did convert it into an observation ->https://simplifier.net/ui/publication/show?projectkey=SampleProj&pubUrlKey=DeviceMetricObservationProfile
I'm unable to verify if its correctly done. Could someone please verify if its legit? Thanks

"rateUnit": "mg/dL/min",
